## Public Member Functions

### convertToErrorCode() {#ac45d48ae9ffe7ea3ff82c9e6c97ff01c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::error&#95;code llvm::remarks::YAMLParseError::convertToErrorCode () const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Convert this error to a std::error&#95;code.

This is a temporary crutch to enable interaction with code still using std::error&#95;code. It will be removed in the future.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/remarks/yamlremarkparser-h/#l00039">39</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/remarks/yamlremarkparser-h">YAMLRemarkParser.h</a>.
